.
Action Taken by VA on Receipt of the Certification from SSA
Follow the steps in the table below when the SSA furnishes the appropriate letter and the amended certification.
Step
Action
1
Send a locally-generated letter concerning the termination of benefits to the payee for the child who is attaining age 18, using the copy of the letter furnished by SSA as a pattern, and
send a copy of the letter to the servicing SSA PSC.
2
Take any necessary award action that may be required by the receipt of an amended certification, and
send a copy of any letter written to the payee to the servicing SSA PSC.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
